awakenings.effect: When using auto kill to attack targets with negative effects: Skill damage increased by 30%.
[Skill] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4
Auto skill additionally makes target receive 10% more ice damage.
When skill hits target with HP below 50%: Immediately applies [Weakness].

effects: For each negative effect on the attacked target, this character damage increases by 20%, maximum stacking 3 layers (60%)
memoryCard.name: Battlefield Flower

auto.description: Deals 60% attack power as ice damage to all enemy in fronts. Applies Weakness debuff: Reduces enemy damage by 5.8% per stack. Maximum 3 stacks, lasts 10 seconds
auto.name: Steel Charge (钢铁冲锋)

normal.description: Deals 120% attack power as ice damage to enemy unit
normal.name: Suppressive Fire (压制射击)

passive.description: When attacking enemies with negative status effects: Damage increased by 38%.
passive.name: Battle Fanatic (战斗狂热分子)

ultimate.description: Deals 84% attack power as ice damage to all enemy in front. Increases damage taken by 38% for 10 seconds
ultimate.name: Black Nation's Glory (黑色带国的荣耀)
